A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst star wars movie. As a die hard fan I'm deeply disappointed. Ryan Johnson did a terrible job. A bunch of terrible unnecessary scenes like Luke milking a space cow and spear fishing? give me a break. Yoda looked nothing like himself. Snoke's scene had so much potential and they totally ruined it. Kylo's flip flops leave a teenage boy in charge of the dark side? They couldn't have done a worse job
